page.title: 02Farming in Lansallos
page.content: The farming is mostly by small tenant farmers though there area a few larger units formed by combining several smaller units by amalgamation or purchase. It is mostly sheep and cattle rearing,with some cereal crops and potatoes,greens and caulflowers. The smaller farms are not really economically viable and it is only a matter of time before they are absorbed by the larger ones.The farms nearly all supplement the income by letting caravans or doing Bed & Breakfast for tourists. They also let off the redundant buildings, usually to tourists.
